sources.title: Monte Carlo Nights
sources.description: A successful roulette player wrongfully convicted of murder escapes custody and goes in search of the real killer.

sources.title: Monte Carlo Nights
sources.description: A man convicted of murder escapes from the police with only one clue to prove his innocence.

sources.title: Monte Carlo Nights (1934) MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Mary Brian, John Darrow, Yola d'Avril 
 Director: William Nigh

 A man wrongfully convicted of murder escapes custody and goes in search of the real killer. The problem is that he only has one clue to go on.
